author: Jim Meehan
description: Jim Meehan is rightly proud of his ground-breaking tequila-based riff on the classic 20th Century and it is indeed both delicious and well-balanced. He created this before absinthe became available in the USA and now it is, I'd prefer to replace the anis liqueur rinse with a couple of dashes of absinthe incorporated with the other ingredients prior to shaking.
